questions.text: Choose the word whose underlined part differs in pronunciation.

questions.text: Choose the word whose underlined part differs in pronunciation.
questions.explanation: approach có âm /əʊ/ khác. Mẹo: oa/oa... thường /əʊ/.

questions.text: Choose the word whose underlined part differs in pronunciation.
questions.explanation: material khác cách đọc phần gạch chân. Mẹo: -ial hay /iəl/ hoặc /ʃəl/ tuỳ từ.

questions.text: Choose the word whose underlined part differs in pronunciation.
questions.explanation: interviewer có cụm /vjuː/ (view).

questions.text: Choose the word whose underlined part differs in pronunciation.
questions.explanation: clock thường có /ɒ/ khác nhóm /əʊ/.

questions.text: Choose the word whose underlined part differs in pronunciation.

questions.text: Choose the word that differs in the position of primary stress.
questions.explanation: recognize thường nhấn khác nhóm. Mẹo: động từ 2 âm tiết hay nhấn âm 2.

questions.text: Choose the word that differs in the position of primary stress.
questions.explanation: biologist nhấn khác. Mẹo: -tion thường nhấn trước nó.

questions.explanation: -eer thường nhấn chính (engiNEER).

questions.text: Our tour guide gave us a list of local tourist ______, including museums, parks, and historical sites.
questions.explanation: Collocation: tourist attractions.

questions.text: She ______ with her friends at the festival when the fireworks started.
questions.explanation: When + past simple; hành động đang diễn ra → past continuous.

questions.text: Nam thinks going hiking in the mountains is ______ than swimming in a pool.
questions.explanation: So sánh hơn: more + adj dài.

questions.text: If we ______ renewable energy sources, we ______ our carbon footprints.
questions.explanation: Điều kiện loại 1: If + V1, will + V.

questions.text: Phuong: "I’ve just been recognized to be the best student of the month!" Amelia: "_____"
choices: No worries. Everything will be alright.
questions.explanation: Tin vui → chúc mừng.

questions.text: Da Nang, ______ is famous for its international fireworks festival, attracts thousands of visitors every year.
questions.explanation: Mệnh đề quan hệ không xác định → which.

questions.text: Chi was ______ when she saw the beautiful sunset for the first time.
questions.explanation: Amazed (cảm thấy ngạc nhiên).

questions.text: Drinking ______ of fruit juice is a good way to get vitamins.
questions.explanation: a lot of + N (không đếm được).

questions.text: The phrase "attention span" in the text probably means ______.
choices: the learning style someone can choose
the learning method someone can use
the period of time someone can focus
questions.explanation: attention span = thời gian tập trung.

questions.text: Lin was over the moon when she became the leader of her school DIY club.
questions.explanation: Over the moon = extremely happy.

questions.text: Last weekend, their family enjoyed a picnic ______ the river bank.
questions.explanation: on the river bank (cụm đúng).

questions.text: If he ______ a few years younger, I’m sure he would get the job.
questions.explanation: Điều kiện loại 2: If + were.

questions.text: It’s the first time I ______ to work by bike.
questions.explanation: It’s the first time + present perfect.

questions.text: The tour guide asked the tourists ______ heavy bags when hiking in the mountain.
questions.explanation: Ask + O + not to V.

questions.text: I wish I ______ a chance to take a photography class next school year.
questions.explanation: Wish về tương lai: could + V.

questions.text: Minh made more spelling mistakes than I did.
choices: I made less spelling mistakes than Minh did.
I didn’t make as many spelling mistakes as Minh did.
I didn’t make as much spelling mistakes as Minh did.
I didn’t make more spelling mistakes as Minh did.
questions.explanation: more ... than → not as many ... as.

questions.text: Unless people take action to protect the environment, climate change will get worse.
choices: If people don’t take action to protect the environment, climate change will get worse.
If people take action to protect the environment, climate change will get worse.
If people don’t take action to protect the environment, climate change would get worse.
If people took action to protect the environment, climate change would get worse.
questions.explanation: Unless = If ... not.

questions.text: People think that reading can improve our imagination and creativity.
choices: Reading is thought that can improve our imagination and creativity.
Reading is thought improve our imagination and creativity.
It is thought that reading can improve our imagination and creativity.
It is thought that reading to improve our imagination and creativity.
questions.explanation: It is thought that + clause.

questions.text: Mike: "I’ve just got awarded a scholarship!" Chi: "_____"
choices: No worries. Everything will be alright.
questions.explanation: Chúc mừng.
